name: BBC News - compress new layout - tweak
description:
The Beeb keep changing their site so I've given up on trying to keep up - sorry. 2009-DEC-07.

This is a tweak of Phil_X style "BBC News - compress new layout".
It combines the useful and/or pretty bits of the banners into a compact style.

My first attempt at Stylish-ing so there are probably some mistakes.
